lead_paragraph: BELKIN--Arlette C.,passed away on May 11, 2016 after a long and courageous battle with heart disease. She is survived by her loving family, husband Gene, daughter, Andrea, son-in-law David, sister Jacqueline, and grandchildren Michael, Marisa and Jonathan. Her daughter Suzanne predeceased her. In addition to being a beloved wife, mother, sister and grandmother, she was also a teacher, educator, artist and community volunteer. Loved by all who knew her, she is greatly missed by her adoring family and friends. 1/3
